opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of November, 2012, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the jurists’ names from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
